bladegunner:card.RevolverCard.description: *Shoot = 1 [Atk] NL Play this when combat starts.
bladegunner:card.RevolverCard.upgradeDescription: *Shoot = 2 [Atk] NL Play this when combat starts.

bladegunner:card.RussianRoulette.description: Can only be played if you equip Revolver with 1 [Ammo]. NL *Shoot. NL +5 [Atk]
bladegunner:card.RussianRoulette.upgradeDescription: Can only be played if you equip Revolver with 1 [Ammo]. NL *Shoot. NL +7 [Atk]

bladegunner:card.LowAmmoAnxiety.description: 2 [Atk] NL If you have less than half of the [Ammo] on your *Gun, 1 [Atk]
bladegunner:card.LowAmmoAnxiety.upgradeDescription: 3 [Atk] NL If you have less than half of the [Ammo] on your *Gun, 2 [Atk]

bladegunner:card.GunstockStrike.description: 1 [Atk] NL +1 [Atk] for each *Gun you have played.
bladegunner:card.GunstockStrike.upgradeDescription: 1 [Atk] NL +2 [Atk] for each *Gun you have played.

bladegunner:card.DualShot.description: If you have 2 [Ammo] on your *Gun, [E] [E]. NL *Shoot twice.
bladegunner:card.DualShot.upgradeDescription: If you have 3 or less [Ammo] on your *Gun, NL [E] [E]. NL *Shoot twice.

bladegunner:card.Gunsmoke.upgradeDescription: Choose and remove one or more [Ammo] on your *Gun. NL [Vulnerable]

bladegunner:card.EmergencyReload.upgradeDescription: *Reload. NL [E] NL Draw a card. NL [Dazed]

bladegunner:card.PreparingStance.description: 2 [Def] NL If no empty slot on your *Gun, [E].
bladegunner:card.PreparingStance.upgradeDescription: 3 [Def] NL If no empty slot on your *Gun, [E].

bladegunner:card.GunAsShield.description: X [Def] NL X equal to [Atk] on your *Gun. NL Draw a card.
bladegunner:card.GunAsShield.upgradeDescription: X+1 [Def] NL X equal to [Atk] on your *Gun. NL Draw a card.

bladegunner:card.TacticalRetreat.description: 1 [Def] NL +1 [Atk] to next Attack you play this turn.

bladegunner:card.CombatMemories.description: Put a most recently played *Shooting *card from discard pile to your hand.
bladegunner:card.CombatMemories.upgradeDescription: Put 2 most recently played *Shooting *cards from discard pile to your hand.

bladegunner:card.MadBlade.description: Gain [Flex]. NL *End *of *this *turn: unless you have played Non-Shoot Attacks, lose [Flex]. NL *Exhaust.
bladegunner:card.MadBlade.upgradeDescription: Gain [Flex]. NL *End *of *this *turn: unless you have played Non-Shoot Attacks, lose [Flex].

bladegunner:card.IncreaseCaliber.description: Gain [Flex]. NL Remove all [Ammo] on your *Gun. NL *Exhaust.
bladegunner:card.IncreaseCaliber.upgradeDescription: Gain [Flex]. NL Remove all [Ammo] on your *Gun.

bladegunner:card.MasterOfGuns.description: Draw 2 cards. NL +1 card for each *Gun you have played.
bladegunner:card.MasterOfGuns.upgradeDescription: Draw 3 cards. NL +1 card for each *Gun you have played.

bladegunner:card.BeWellArmed.description: 1 [Def] NL +1 [Def] for each *Gun you have played.
bladegunner:card.BeWellArmed.upgradeDescription: 2 [Def] NL +1 [Def] for each *Gun you have played.

bladegunner:card.MagazineExpansion.description: When *Shoot or *Reload, you may use or put [Ammo] on this card.

bladegunner:card.AccurateShoot.description: *Shoot twice. NL If you are solo, in boss fight, or targeting enemies on other row, +1 [Atk].
bladegunner:card.AccurateShoot.upgradeDescription: *Shoot twice. NL If you are solo, in boss fight, or targeting enemies on other row, +2 [Atk].

bladegunner:card.Disassemble.description: *Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.
bladegunner:card.Disassemble.upgradeDescription: *Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.

bladegunner:card.MadGun.description: *Shoot X times. NL You can shoot even no [Ammo] or limited by Sniper Rifle.
bladegunner:card.MadGun.upgradeDescription: *Shoot X+1 times. NL You can shoot even no [Ammo] or limited by Sniper Rifle.

bladegunner:card.DimensionalShoot.description: *Shoot. NL Other players can pay [E] once to +2 *Shoot. NL *Exhaust.

bladegunner:card.ExhaustingStrike.description: 6 [Atk] NL Remove all [Ammo] from your *Gun. NL If more than 3, gain [Flex].
bladegunner:card.ExhaustingStrike.upgradeDescription: 8 [Atk] NL Remove all [Ammo] from your *Gun. NL If more than 3, gain [Flex].

bladegunner:card.Camouflage.description: For 2 turns, you can't lose more than 1 HP per turn, NL nor play Attacks whose NL [Atk] + [Flex] < 4.
bladegunner:card.Camouflage.upgradeDescription: For 2 turns, you can't lose more than 1 HP per turn, NL nor play Attacks whose NL [Atk] + [Flex] < 4.

bladegunner:card.FlashBang.description: For 2 turns, -1 [Atk] from damage you take.
bladegunner:card.FlashBang.upgradeDescription: For 3 turns, -1 [Atk] from damage you take.

bladegunner:card.Supplement.description: *Reload. NL If no [Ammo] on your *Gun, draw 2 cards, [E] [E].
bladegunner:card.Supplement.upgradeDescription: *Reload. NL If no [Ammo] on your *Gun, draw 3 cards, [E] [E] [E].

bladegunner:card.Pursue.description: The first Attack you play each turn costs 1 less [E].

bladegunner:card.RocketLauncherCard.description: *Shoot = [All] 3 [Atk] NL You can't use [Ammo] on Magazine Expansion. NL You can use [E] to *Reload.
bladegunner:card.RocketLauncherCard.upgradeDescription: *Shoot = [All] 4 [Atk] NL You can't use [Ammo] on Magazine Expansion. NL You can use [E] to *Reload.

bladegunner:card.BarrageOfBullets.description: *Shoot X times. NL X equal to count of [Ammo] on your board. NL Remove 1 [Ammo] from your board.
bladegunner:card.BarrageOfBullets.upgradeDescription: *Shoot X times. NL X equal to count of [Ammo] on your board.

bladegunner:card.ReloadingPractice.description: 2 [Def] NL Put 1 [Ammo] on your board. NL You can't play additional cards this turn.
bladegunner:card.ReloadingPractice.upgradeDescription: 3 [Def] NL Put 1 [Ammo] on your board. NL You can't play additional cards this turn.

bladegunner:card.SpecialVulnerary.description: Heal X-1 HP. NL X equal to count of [Ammo] on your board.
bladegunner:card.SpecialVulnerary.upgradeDescription: Heal X HP. NL X equal to count of [Ammo] on your board.

bladegunner:card.BulletsInSand.description: Put 2X [Ammo] on this card. NL *Start *of *turn: Move 2 [Ammo] to your board.
bladegunner:card.BulletsInSand.upgradeDescription: Put 2X+2 [Ammo] on this card. NL *Start *of *turn: Move 2 [Ammo] to your board.

bladegunner:card.Eject.description: Remove all [Ammo] on your *Gun. NL Put 2 [Ammo] on your board.
bladegunner:card.Eject.upgradeDescription: Remove all [Ammo] on your *Gun. NL Put 3 [Ammo] on your board.

bladegunner:card.ShellDefense.description: When you use [Ammo] on your board, you may gain 1 [Def] instead of 1 [E].
bladegunner:card.ShellDefense.upgradeDescription: When you use [Ammo] on your board, gain 1 [Def].

bladegunner:card.Thrift.description: When [Dazed] is *Exhausted, put 1 [Ammo] on your board.

bladegunner:card.OffenseToDefense.description: 1 [Def] NL You may discard a card. If it's an Attack, gain [Def] equal to its [Atk] + your [Flex].
bladegunner:card.OffenseToDefense.upgradeDescription: 2 [Def] NL You may discard a card. If it's an Attack, gain [Def] equal to its [Atk] + your [Flex].

bladegunner:card.HotShells.description: Remove all [Ammo] on your *Gun. NL For each removed [Ammo], NL [All] 1 [Atk] to all rows. NL *Exhaust.

bladegunner:card.LaserPistolCard.description: *Shoot = 1 [Atk] NL +1 [Atk] for every 4 [Ammo] on this card
bladegunner:card.LaserPistolCard.upgradeDescription: *Shoot = 1 [Atk] NL +1 [Atk] for every 3 [Ammo] on this card

bladegunner:card.MechaForm.description: *Start *of *turn: If you have: NL *Revolver: Gain [Flex]. NL *Shotgun: [E], draw 2 cards. NL *Laser *Pistol: Put 2 [Ammo] on it, NL for [Atk] calculation only. NL *Sniper *Rifle: 2 [Def] NL *Rocket *Launcher: You may *Shoot with it or *Reload it.

ttsgen:GoldenTicket.description: Golden Ticket can't be added to your deck. NL When you reveal Golden Ticket, reveal a card from your rare deck.
